Package UserCode.pets

Interface Summary
IBehaviour IBehaviour: the interface for any behaviour.
IBehaviourMgr IBehaviourMgr: A manager of a set of IBehaviours
ICollidable ICollidable: something that can collide with an ICollider.
ICollider ICollider: something that can be collided with.
IToken IToken defines the interface for all tokens within a JFF simulation.
ITokenFactory ITokenFactory: specifically to create Tokens.
 

Class Summary
BallBehaviour BallBehaviour - implements behaviour of fish (as a ball).
Behaviour Abstract class Behaviour - all common code required for implementing behaviours.
BehaviourMgr BehaviourMgr: implementation of IBehaviour - a manager of a set of IBehaviours.
PaddleBehaviour PaddleBehaviour - implements movement behaviour for pong paddle.
Token The Token class provides all properties/behaviour to display a token in an Env3D simulation.
TokenFactory TokenFactory: a helper class to create displayable tokens.
TokenTest The test class TokenTest, for testing Token.
 

Exception Summary
ArgumentOutOfBoundsException The ArgumentOutOfBoundsException class: used to flag when a parameter is outside the defined range of values.
